select mp.id as 'permissionId',mp.matter_id as 'matterId',mp.role_id as 'roleId',mp.role_type as 'roleType', mp.action as 'action',case when mp.role_type=0 then r.role_name else u.actual_name end as 'roleName', case when mp.role_type=0 then r.role_desc else u.username end as 'roleDesc',u.avatar from matter_permissions mp left join `role` r on r.id = mp.role_id and mp.role_type=0 left join `user` u on u.id = mp.role_id and mp.role_type=1
where mp.matter_id=#{matterId}
